description:
"I like to do everything," Ivan said. "But bottoming is fun!"
It was nice to have him back. And I think we all knew he would be back because when you have someone as sexual and open as Ivan, you can't let that go to waste!
Ivan liked Alan. A lot!
"He's very dominant," Ivan said. "He seems very military. I really like that!"
Of course, Alan was very dominant. He started off slow with Ivan, but in no time he was pounding Ivan's ass hard!
title: Ivan & Alan
